Data Fields
NV_MOSAIC_DISPLAY_SETTING Struct Reference
Mosaic APIs

#include <nvapi.h>

Data Fields

NvU32 version
NvU32 width
NvU32 height
NvU32 bpp
NvU32 freq

Detailed Description

Basic per-display settings that are used in setting/getting the Mosaic mode.
